LanguageSelection.title: Language Selection
LanguageSelection.description: Please, choose your preferred language that you want to be set on the application, it can also be changed anytime.

OnBoarding.title: Etlas
OnBoarding.description: Is an augmented reality application that helps people to recognize monuments during their tour in anywhere in  the world by only a scan using your mobile camera.
OnBoarding.worrytext: No worries, your tour guide is here ;)

Register.title: Register
Register.description: Please, fill your information up carefully.
Register.passwordhint: Password must be at least 8 characters and must contain letters and symbols.
